setting.label: Configurations:
[B]Set Basic keys[/B] Use this to access 'Help' with 'H'
[B]Set All keys[/B] [COLOR red](Recommended)[/COLOR] Shortcuts with 'F' | Update library with 'U' | Change views with 'V'
[B]Set All Keys & CUSTOM Linux keys[/B] [COLOR red](Universal Remote only)[/COLOR] Same as above with the addition of 6 Universal Remote keys.
[B]Set All Keys & CUSTOM Windows10 keys[/B] [COLOR red](Universal Remote only)[/COLOR] Same as above with only 3 additional Universal Remote keys.
[LIGHT](Reload keys or restart kodi for changes to take affect)[/LIGHT]
[B][RELOAD Keys][/B]
[B][RESET Keys to Default][/B]
[COLOR blue]Log files:[/COLOR]
- Changelog - [COLOR lightblue](opens changelog for current addon)[/COLOR]
[COLOR green][Click to View][/COLOR]
- Kodi Log - [COLOR lightblue](opens Debug log for current session)[/COLOR]
[COLOR green][Click to View][/COLOR]
Delete Temporary files:
[COLOR red][LIGHT](Deleting Temporary files may actually slow down Kodi)[CR](only use if no free space is available)[/LIGHT][/COLOR]
- Clear cache - [COLOR lightblue](Deletes temporary files cached by kodi)[/COLOR]
[COLOR green][Click to Clear][/COLOR]
- Clear Thumbnails - [COLOR lightblue](Deletes temporary images cached by kodi)[/COLOR]
[COLOR green][Click to Clear][/COLOR]
- Clear Packages - [COLOR lightblue](Deletes temporary package zips cached by kodi)[/COLOR]
[COLOR green][Click to Clear][/COLOR]

[COLOR red][B]Clicking the above settings may cause [I]'permanent'[/I] changes to your device,[/B][CR]By clicking them, you do so at your own risk[/COLOR]
